tips.title: Quick File Navigation
tips.content: Press `{shortcut}` to quickly search and open files in your workspace. Start typing the filename to filter the list.

tips.title: Command Palette
tips.content: Access all VS Code commands with `{shortcut}`. This is your gateway to everything VS Code can do!

tips.title: Multi-Cursor Editing
tips.content: Hold `{shortcut}` and click to add multiple cursors. Edit multiple lines simultaneously!

tips.title: Zen Mode
tips.content: Toggle distraction-free coding with `Ctrl+K Z`. Press `Esc` twice to exit.

tips.title: Integrated Terminal
tips.content: Toggle the integrated terminal with `` Ctrl+` `` (backtick). Keep coding and running commands without switching windows.

tips.title: Smart Selection
tips.content: Press `{shortcut}` to select the next occurrence of the current selection. Great for renaming variables or making multiple similar changes!

tips.title: Split Editor Views
tips.content: Use `{shortcut}` to split the editor into multiple panes. Perfect for viewing different parts of the same file or comparing files side by side.

tips.title: Search Across Files
tips.content: Use `{shortcut}` to search across all files in your workspace. Perfect for finding specific code or text patterns.

tips.title: Quick File Creation
tips.content: Use `{shortcut}` for a new untitled file. Add multiple files quickly without leaving your keyboard.

tips.title: IntelliSense Everywhere
tips.content: Press `{shortcut}` anywhere to manually trigger IntelliSense suggestions. Works in code, settings, and even JSON files!

tips.title: Breadcrumbs Navigation
tips.content: Click the breadcrumbs above the editor or press `{shortcut}` to quickly navigate through your file's structure.

tips.title: Quick Fix and Actions
tips.content: Press `{shortcut}` when you see a lightbulb ðŸ’¡ to view quick fixes and refactoring options.

tips.title: Navigate Back and Forward
tips.content: Use `{shortcut}` to navigate back and forward through your cursor positions.

tips.title: Toggle Line Comment
tips.content: Press `{shortcut}` to toggle line comments. Works with multiple lines selected too!

tips.title: Move Lines Up/Down
tips.content: Use `{shortcut}` to move lines up or down. Great for reorganizing code quickly!

tips.title: Format Document
tips.content: Press `{shortcut}` to format your entire document. Keep your code clean and consistent!

tips.title: Go to Definition
tips.content: Press `F12` to jump to the definition of a symbol. Hold `{shortcut}` and hover over code to peek at definitions!

tips.title: Find All References
tips.content: Press `{shortcut}` to find all references to the current symbol. Great for understanding how code is used across your project.

tips.title: Rename Symbol
tips.content: Press `F2` to rename a symbol and automatically update all references throughout your code.

tips.title: Problems Panel
tips.content: Use `{shortcut}` to toggle the Problems panel and see all errors and warnings in your workspace.

tips.title: Quick Open Previous File
tips.content: Press `{shortcut}` to quickly switch between recently used files. Hold the modifier key to see more options!

tips.title: Toggle Word Wrap
tips.content: Press `{shortcut}` to toggle word wrap. No more horizontal scrolling for long lines!

tips.title: Fold/Unfold Code
tips.content: Use `{shortcut}` to fold and unfold code blocks. Keep your editor tidy!
